pkgmetadata.longdescription: # coolpyThis is a project demonstrating how publich a muon beam cooling module to PyPI##InstallationRun the following to install:'''python pip install coolpy'''##Usage'''python from coolpy import quadrupole## Generate "Qudarupole matrix!"'''# Developing Hello WorldTo install coolpy, aling with the tool you need to develop and run tests, run the following in you r virtualenv:'''bash$ pip install -e .[dev]'''
